text: Þis syndan þa landgemæru to wendlesclife.
Ærest of ðam forda æt hleowede hlawe swa se broc sceot on nanes monnes land.
<../images/tbar.gif>swa on wirdene þanen on rahlinc þonen on dyrnes treow þonon on heanes pol.
Þanan on ða ealdan dic to imman beorge.
Þonan on hwætan mersc swa on suðbroc andlang broces on blacan mere.
Swa on ða ealdan dic andlang dices on ane riðige of þære riðe on ane ealde dic.
Of þære dice on tyrl andlang tyrl on mærbroc of þam broce on þone ealdan weg andlang weges up on Coccan burh of þære burhges gete on Hengestes heafod.
Swa on<../images/tbar.gif>slæd to Cyppanhamme on ane riðe andlang riðes on þone herpað to hindehlypan þanon on scirwyllan andlang cumbes on fearnslæd.
Þanan on watancumb þanon on wulfleage.
Þanon on calfhealas andlang weges to finan mædwuum.
And swa on pippan slæd & on herrihtes beorh & on hweogel weg to þan rahhege on heafoc wyllan andlang riðes on tyrl andlang tyrl onbutan þa mædewe.
Swa on þone ford æt hleowede hlæwe.
